trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol is despairing at the workers' clumsiness.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid mineral oil in the K'mul Astropolis)) ((Deliver the splendid mineral oil to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid greenwattle in the K'mul Astropolis)) ((Deliver the splendid greenwattle to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather a splendid pondfrond at the Lozatl)) ((Deliver the splendid pondfrond to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Underground caverns can be frightfully dangerous, you know! The workers are constantly tripping over and grazing their snouts and whatnot.

TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>Thankfully, the Viis were kind enough to share a recipe for a salve that works wonders for scrapes and cuts. If you're not terribly busy, I was wondering if you'd help gather some of the necessary ingredients?

TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>For now, I need some mineral oil, which you should be able to find near the K'mul Astropolis. There's no rush, but sooner is always infinitely preferable to later!

TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>For now, I need some greenwattle, which you should be able to find near the K'mul Astropolis. There's no rush, but sooner is always infinitely preferable to later!

TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>For now, I just need a piece of pondfrond, which grows in the Lozatl. It's rather difficult to find, but a fruit worm will lead you right to it. By all accounts, they're drawn to the smell!
TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_QHOTERLPASOL_000_070<tab>I can tell by the spring in your step you've met with some success. Come along then, let's see what you've brought me!

TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_QHOTERLPASOL_000_080<tab>Splendid! With this, I'll have a fresh batch of ointment ready in no time at all, though I cannot help but feel that, in this case, prevention would be better than cure.

TEXT_BANQIQ110_03815_QHOTERLPASOL_000_081<tab>Perhaps if the workers could refrain from injuring themselves at every given opportunity, there wouldn't be such high demand for the stuff. Until then, I may have need to call on your talents again!
